name: catalpa
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a deciduous tree (= one that loses its leaves in autumn and grows new ones in the spring) that grows in warm areas of North America and Asia and produces large leaves, white flowers, and wood that is often used to make furniture: Catalpas were planted in the park to provide shade along the walking paths. She visited her childhood home and was glad to see that the catalpa tree she climbed as a child was still there.
